menuItems.name: Ribeye Steak
menuItems.description: Tender ribeye steak grilled to perfection, served with mashed potatoes and vegetables.

menuItems.name: Filet Mignon
menuItems.description: A juicy, buttery filet mignon served with a side of garlic butter and roasted vegetables.

menuItems.name: T-bone Steak
menuItems.description: A classic T-bone steak with a perfect balance of tenderloin and strip steak, grilled to your liking.

menuItems.name: New York Strip
menuItems.description: A flavorful New York strip steak, seasoned and grilled to perfection, served with saut√©ed spinach.

menuItems.name: Sirloin Steak
menuItems.description: A lean, flavorful sirloin steak grilled to your desired temperature, served with garlic mashed potatoes.

menuItems.name: Steak Frites
menuItems.description: Grilled steak served with crispy French fries and a side of garlic butter sauce.

menuItems.name: Pepperoni Pizza
menuItems.description: Classic pizza topped with savory pepperoni and melted mozzarella cheese.

menuItems.name: Hawaiian Pizza
menuItems.description: A delicious blend of ham, pineapple, and mozzarella cheese on a tangy tomato sauce base.

menuItems.name: Vegetarian Pizza
menuItems.description: A medley of fresh vegetables like bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and olives on a thin crust.

menuItems.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
menuItems.description: Grilled chicken, red onions, and mozzarella cheese topped with smoky BBQ sauce.

menuItems.name: Margarita Pizza
menuItems.description: A classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomato sauce, and fresh basil leaves.

menuItems.name: Meat Lovers Pizza
menuItems.description: A hearty pizza topped with pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ham on a cheesy base.

menuItems.name: Greek Salad
menuItems.description: Crisp lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese, dressed in olive oil and lemon.

menuItems.name: Caprese Salad
menuItems.description: Fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, basil leaves, and balsamic glaze.

menuItems.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
menuItems.description: Grilled chicken on a bed of romaine lettuce, with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan.
